about.description: I'm Riya Chavan, a Final Year B.Tech Computer Science (Data Science) student at DJ Sanghvi College of Engineering. I work at the intersection of AI, ML, and Full-Stack Engineering to build intelligent, scalable, and useful solutions.

education.institution: Dwarkadas J. Sanghvi College of Engineering, Mumbai

internships.description: Built an AI-driven pipeline that transforms long-form videos into short, engaging clips using OpenAI Whisper for speech understanding and Generative AI for content summarization. Integrated AI agents via LLMs and Autogen to automate tasks like scene detection, smart tagging, content filtering, and media workflow orchestration. Leveraged Amazon S3 for scalable storage.

Built a GenAI-powered fashion recommendation and visual search system for an e-commerce platform. Utilized pre-trained LLaMA models to generate multimodal embeddings from product and human images. Stored high-dimensional vectors in AstraDB (Cassandra-based vector DB) and implemented real-time similarity search to retrieve and rank visually and semantically relevant items, boosting search relevance, personalization, and user engagement.
